Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Laramie
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Laramie due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Laramie due to a sick customer.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#52 Kedzie/California

#94 South California

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
